title: vizique
author: vizique
created_time: October 24, 2023, 03:17:37 PMLast edit: October 24, 2023, 03:41:31 PM by vizique
content: The Agents are here!Up for auction today are two Agents by Vizique.Originally sculpted by Jonathon MatthewsLimited Edition made by DC CollectiblesRepurposed by Vizique usingLOT 1 - USD Agent - Bentley Racing Green spray, Mercedes Gun metal grey for gun, genuine $100 bill (in case of emergencies - not that it will be worth anything by the time you need it)STARTING BID: 0.005BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTCLOT 2 - BTC Agent - Lamborghini Arancio Ishtar OrangeSTARTING BID: 0.005BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTCFigurines are 9"/23cm tall (12"/30cm in glass dome)END TIME: OCTOBER 27th, 2023, MIDNIGHT GMT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: 1Dh6Rnb2we1opNQCbQMWT9VrFziBySpeA3SHIPPING: Based on location and preference (at cost)

comments.author: vizique
comments.created_time: October 24, 2023, 03:18:12 PMLast edit: October 24, 2023, 03:28:21 PM by vizique
comments.body: Each figurine will come with a copy of the BTCvUSD XCP NFThttps://xchain.io/asset/btcvusdCheersViz

comments.body: oh? I thought it ended at midnight on the 27th - that was about 18.5 hours ago by my calculation. The coming "midnight" will actually be the 28th.
